session_info.title: 15-Minute HIIT Energy Booster
session_info.description: High-intensity workout to boost energy and burn calories

exercises.name: Leg Swings
exercises.instructions: Hold wall, swing each leg front to back

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.instructions: Squat, jump back to plank, push-up, jump forward, jump up

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest quickly
exercises.modifications: Slower pace, hands on elevated surface

exercises.name: Jump Squats
exercises.instructions: Squat down, explode up into jump, land softly

exercises.name: Push-up to T
exercises.instructions: Push-up, rotate to side plank, alternate sides

exercises.name: Reverse Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step back into lunge, alternate legs

exercises.name: Plank Jacks
exercises.instructions: Plank position, jump feet wide and narrow
exercises.modifications: Step feet out instead of jumping

exercises.name: Walking in Place
exercises.instructions: Slow pace, bring heart rate down

exercises.name: Deep Breathing
exercises.instructions: 4 counts in, 4 counts out, hands on chest

safety_notes: Stop if you feel dizzy or unwell
Modify exercises as needed for your fitness level
